mapper.insert: INSERT INTO portal_limit ( code, name, name_en, description, limit_value, status, created_date, created_by ) VALUES ( #{code}, #{name}, #{nameEn}, #{description}, #{limit}, #{status}, NOW(), #{createdBy} );
mapper.update: UPDATE portal_limit SET name = #{name}, name_en = #{nameEn}, <!-- Thêm trường name_en --> description = #{description}, limit_value = #{limit}, <!-- Thay đổi từ max_limit thành limit --> status = #{status}, updated_date = NOW(), updated_by = #{updatedBy} WHERE code = #{code};
